definition: (emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as
plain/informal/suitable/convenient/opportune/to urinate or defecate/equivalent to 就[jiu4]: then/in that case/even if/soon afterwards
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)
a woman's virtue is to have no talent (idiom)
pinyin: nu:3 zi3 wu2 cai2 bian4 shi4 de2

definition: lit. whoever provides milk is your mother (idiom)/fig. to follow whoever is feeding you/to put one's loyalties where one's interests lie

sentences.english: The very major problem that Chinese mathematics faces is lack of leadership.
sentences.chinese: 当今中国数学界面对的大难，便是缺乏领导者。

sentences.english: And to accept that - to quote him - "it shoots, it hits".
sentences.chinese: 引用作者的话，便是，箭在射，箭打中了靶心。

sentences.english: A section of defeat's sentiment most abstains from is, never forgets.
sentences.chinese: 壹段失败的感情最忌讳的便是，念念不忘。

sentences.english: The most common method of supplying air to the bag is by a blowpipe.
sentences.chinese: 最常见的向风袋输送空气的方法便是用导管。

sentences.english: One of the best sites to find gas-related information is GasBuddy.com.
sentences.chinese: 便是一个你能获得与汽油相关信息的最好的网站之一。

sentences.english: Yes, if the world is the sky, then everyone is a star.
sentences.chinese: 是的，如果世界是天空，每一个人便是一颗星。

sentences.english: Susan: Because, I have a lot of things to say so you can just listen.
sentences.chinese: 因为我有很多话要说，你尽管听便是了。

sentences.english: Our Chineseare are good at tell the good news, not but the bad news.
sentences.chinese: 我们中国人最擅长的，便是报喜不报忧。

sentences.english: This is the straight mind, this is our practice in the dojo.
sentences.chinese: 这便是直心，这才是我们修行的道场。

sentences.english: Alucard: Mankind continues to fight, but it is a desperate fight to stay alive.
sentences.chinese: 人类依旧争斗不止，其生命本身便是一场绝望的战斗。

sentences.english: If we want to "get somewhere" in life, this is Saturn talking.
sentences.chinese: 如果我们想到达生命中的某处，这便是土星在发话。

sentences.english: Photon Cannons, or the little hand thingies.
sentences.chinese: 光子炮，便是那个小手一律澳门新澳门赌场东西。

sentences.english: The first thing that struck Georgiana when entering the laboratory was the hot furnace.
sentences.chinese: 走进实验室后第一件让她吃惊的事便是里面的暖气。

sentences.english: The highly complex maneuver is known as the Cheng Fei vault.
sentences.chinese: 这一套高难度的动作便是人们所熟知的“程菲跳”。

sentences.english: The baker, who was the proprietor in person, took up a loaf and a knife.
sentences.chinese: 那卖面包的便是店主人，他拿起了一个面包和一把刀。

definition: (emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as
(emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)
to be bound to/to be sure to
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
generally speaking/by and large/for the most part
plain/informal/suitable/convenient/opportune/to urinate or defecate/equivalent to 就[jiu4]: then/in that case/even if/soon afterwards
that/those/then (in that case)/commonly pr. [nei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing
